name: Pico
subtitle: Gamified Study Platform
description: Pico is a mobile application that transforms exam study into a game, with AI-selected questions, study schedules, and competition with friends. It helps students stop procrastinating and build lasting habits to enter their dream schools and careers.

name: SignLink
subtitle: Sign Language Learning Platform
description: SignLink is a sign language platform launched in Brazil in 2023 and currently incubated by StartFellowship in Switzerland. With gamified learning paths, an expanding dictionary, and a focus on human presence, the project facilitates learning multiple sign languages to break international barriers.
